title: Mock Copilot Request Input
description: Defines the optional parameters accepted by the mock response generator script.

message_content.description: The desired content for the mock response message. Defaults to a standard placeholder if omitted.

completion_tokens.description: A specific number of completion tokens to use. If omitted, this is calculated based on the message_content length.

prompt_tokens.description: A specific number of prompt tokens to use. Defaults to 75 if omitted.
